content:
addRule()
	.when(Query.fromType(org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.javaee.model.JNDIResourceModel)
		.as(default).or(Query.fromType(org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.javaee.model
		.ThreadPoolModel).as(default))
)
	.perform(ResolveServerResourceLinksRule
)
withId("Resolve Links to Server Documentation_1")
